sign_up.title: Ƙirƙiri Asusun Wapfi ɗinku
sign_up.subtitle: Yi rijista don fara tafiyar ku
sign_up.agree_terms: Ta hanyar shiga, kuna yarda da
sign_up.error: An riga an yi rijista da wannan imel ko lambar waya. Da fatan a shiga ko amfani da wani daban.

errors.full_name_required: Da fatan a shigar da cikakken suna

errors.password_min: Kalmar sirri dole ta kasance aƙalla haruffa 8

change_password.title: Canza Kalmar Sirri
change_password.subtext: Shigar da kalmar sirri ta yanzu kuma saita sabuwa don kiyaye asusunka lafiya
change_password.success: An canza kalmar sirri cikin nasara!
change_password.general_error: Da fatan a cika duka filayen daidai don sabunta kalmar sirri.

errors.password_required: Da fatan za a shigar da kalmar sirri
errors.password_min: Kalmar sirri dole ta kasance aƙalla haruffa 8
errors.passwords_do_not_match: Kalmar sirri da aka tabbatar ba su dace ba. Don Allah a sake gwadawa.

forgot_password.title: Ka manta kalmar sirri?
forgot_password.subtext: Za mu aiko maka da lamba guda huɗu zuwa imel ko lambar wayarka domin tantance kai da kuma taimaka maka ka saita sabuwar kalmar sirri.
forgot_password.error: Ba za mu iya aika lamban ba. Da fatan a tabbatar da cewa imel ko lambar waya ya dace.
forgot_password.success: An aika da lambobin tabbatarwa cikin nasara!

errors.email_or_phone_required: Da fatan za a shigar da imel ko lambar waya
errors.invalid_email_or_phone: Imel ko lambar waya bai dace ba

placeholders.email_phone: Shigar da imel ko lambar waya

verify.title: Tabbatar da Imel ko Lambar Waya
verify.subtext: Da fatan za a shigar da lambobi huɗu da aka aiko zuwa imel ko lambar wayarka.
verify.error: Lambobin da ka shigar ba daidai bane. Da fatan a sake gwadawa.
verify.success: An tabbatar da lambar cikin nasara!
verify.resend_success: An sake tura sabon lambar tabbatarwa!

errors.digit_required: Da fatan a shigar da lamba

background.headline: Samu rance. Biya da robobi.
background.subtext: Wapfi yana baka rance nan take kuma zaka biya da darajar robobin da zaka iya sake amfani da su.
